name: Consumer Packaging Manufacturers Alliance
goal: To represent and act as a spokesperson for the United Kingdom packaging manufacturing industry in matters of regulation.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, General and Institutional Affairs, Internal Market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: To monitor all issues affecting and potentially influencing the UK packaging industry e.g. EU - TPD ; BREXIT etc
customers: Affinity Packaging,Compositub,Essenta Limited,Parkside Flexible Limited,API Group,Benkert
